author: Xbox
description:
Time to hunt!

The "Sagat Arrives!" Fighting Pass prepares to welcome the Emperor of Muay Thai with avatar gear inspired by Sagat's new look.

Starting with this Fighting Pass, earn new Premium Rewards like brand new outfit colors for Ryu and Ken, as well as Challenger Screen illustrations! Sagat arrives on August 5, so be prepared!

https://www.xbox.com/games/store/street-fighter-6/9NM79B7N9JM6
